name: San Mateo Adult & Community Education
description: Free ESL and adult education classes in San Mateo County
fullDescription: San Mateo Adult & Community Education offers free and low-cost classes for adults including ESL, GED preparation, citizenship, and career skills.
whatTheyOffer:
- ESL classes at all levels (free)
- GED and high school equivalency preparation
- U.S. Citizenship classes
- Career technical education
- Computer and digital literacy
- Parent education
howToGetIt:
1. Visit San Mateo Adult School
2. Complete registration
3. Take placement test for ESL if needed
4. Enroll in classes
keywords: adult school, San Mateo, GED, ESL, high school diploma, adult education, career training, free classes, Peninsula
